body.name: Women's Legendary High Rise Trouser Jean
features: HIGH RISE. Show the world a thing or two about being the fashionable legend you already know you are with these high-rise jeans. A relaxed, high-rise fit gives way to a trouser silhouette with front creases for a fashionable twist to your everyday jeans.
LEGENDARY DETAILS. These high-waisted jeans are finished with our iconic logo patch, spade pockets and hardware that make Lee jeans unique.
STRETCH DENIM. Strut with confidence in these fashionable trouser jeans. Made from authentic stretch denim, they move with you for all-day comfort.

A LIFETIME OF QUALITY. For over 100 years, Lee has produced quality apparel with durability and long-lasting construction in mind. Lee is committed to designing clothing that conforms to your body, allowing you to move through life freely.
SPECIFICATIONS. 5 pockets. Zipper fly with button closure. Inseam: 30" short, 32" medium, 34" long. Rise: 10.5". Bottom Leg Opening: 22.625".
body.description: Lee is an iconic American denim and casual apparel brand that's been making legendary product for legendary people since 1889. With over 125 years of purposeful design and craftsmanship, we know a thing or two about style. Fueled by our core values of authenticity, integrity, and drive, we create products our customers love, time and time again. From uniquely styled jeans, pants, and shorts to on-trend shirts and jackets, our movement-inspired innovations, versatile styling, and superior fit have inspired generations.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I am 6 ft tall and weigh about 210. I typically wear a 14-16, depending on brand. I got a 16 in these after reading lots of reviews, and they fit well. Jeans, and pants in general, rarely fit me. If they are advertised as tall, they are still usually too short. If I'm lucky enough that the inseam is actually long enough, the waist is too short and the pants pull down all day. These pants are unicorns. They are high enough rise to stay put and not settle into a lower area. They fit snug until the hips where the legs widen. They are long enough that I could wear them with a small heal or platform sneaker. They have a touch of stretch but not so much that they get baggy. They wash well and come out of the wash without the legs becoming twisted and wrinkly. They are surprisingly flattering and well made. Good job, Lee!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable, flattering, just enough stretch
reviews.reviewText: These high-waisted, wide-leg jeans by Lee have the perfect fit in a high-quality, thick denim with just enough stretch. I’m 5ft 3in with a curvey figure and I love the way these jeans look on me. The length is just right with a wedge or chunky shoe. They look great with a cropped sweater or tucked in top. The classic Lee back pocket design and waistband patch remind me of my 1970s & ‘80s childhood. As soon as they arrived, they became part of my weekly wear rotation. So glad I made the impulse decision to buy these retro trousers!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Being 6'2, its hard for me to find pants that are actually long enough. And when I do, there is almost always something else wrong with them. These pants are actually comfortable to wear, and are almost long enough for me. While I do wish they were just an inch or two longer, the comfort is a good tradeoff for showing a little bit of ankle.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: What’s wrong with these companies? Don’t they stop and think if you order a small size you’re obviously a small person? I’m not 6’ tall if I order a small size. I was so happy to find jeans in a small size and when I received them they were at least 8” too long. I used to have the energy to hem my own clothes, but not any more. I now expect my clothes to fit if I pay a high enough price for them. I’m disappointed in these jeans. The material is good and they are attractive but come on… I’m not 6’ tall with a waist size of 23 inches. Wake up jeans company’s or you’re going to lose a large amount of business.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The perfect jeans I didn't know I was looking for
reviews.reviewText: I am in love with these jeans. I have a long torso but am petite, with a mid-size pear shape. I've realized in the past few years that jeggings and skinny jeans just aren't it for my build. However, I didn't really know what was. I know baggy jeans are more in these days with the kids, but also didn't want to seem like I was trying to chase a youthful trend as a late-30s mother. These jeans fit perfectly on my waist and hips and then drape really nicely from there. They give my shape the exact balance it was needing. And I love the wide hem! It gives the jeans a slightly more put-together feel, while still working as a casual look. The wash I ordered was not available in a short length, and as someone who is 5'4" and does not like wearing more than a 2" heel, I did have to hem these by a few inches. But it was easily done and now I am actually excited about wearing jeans for the first time in YEARS! If you liked the style of Siobhan Roy but live in the real world, you should get these jeans.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I originally got a 14 regular since that’s my typical size. They fit perfectly but were too long. I did a return/exchange for a 14 short. The waist and hips on the 14 short were smaller and the waist went up higher in the front. The legs were also bigger/wider than the regulars had been. Very disappointing to have such inconsistency in sizes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great fit in waist and seat but way too wide legged

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These fit beautifully. The waist is smaller than most jeans, which is perfect for me. There’s a good stretch as well, making them super comfortable. I am 5’3” 123 lbs and pear-shaped. I ordered a size 6, which fits snug through waist with lots of room over the thighs. The size 6 fit smoothly over my behind without ballooning or sagging fabric. Very flattering. Regarding the length, I don’t wear more than a 1 1/2- 2” boot-heel any more, and even with those, the slacks still touch the floor. They work. No way to hem them without messing with the proportions. I would have preferred the “short”, but it wasn’t available.The fabric of the “elevated retro” color is a nice weight; substantial but soft. The color is a nice medium blue, exactly what I wanted.

Soy de cadera y trasero grande y buena pierna, mi cintura esta bien marcada pero también tengo poco de vientre abultado (después de 3 embarazos mi cuerpo maduró) y estos pantalones me orman perfecto. La tela estira y tiene buen grosor. Son los mejores que he comprado en años.

I love the bottom seam on these trouser jeans! They are elegant enough to wear with a blazer and heels or you can wear sneakers and a t-shirt. They are super soft and very comfortable on this 54 year old body that doesn't really have a waist. Worth the money for sure.

Je mesure 5’1.5’’ et je pèse 170 livres. J’ai acheté un 16 ans et la grandeur est parfaite. Je dois cependant faire une altération pour enlever 2.5’’. La qualité du jeans est vraiment fantastique et le fait qu’il ne soit pas trop extensible, ça donne un beau maintien de la bedaine ;)

No suelo dejar reseñas pero no puedo dejarlo pasar. Tenía tiempo queriendo un pantalón de pierna ancha que no me haga ver como una caja. Por mi estatura, es difícil (1.52m). Normalmente soy talla 28, pedí el 8 short y me quedó perfecto. Es de cintura alta (a mí me queda un par de dedos sobre el ombligo), tiene bonita caída y disimula muy bien la cadera y el estómago.Al sacarlo del empaque se veía extremadamente amplio y pensé que sería un fracaso pero me sorprendió gratamente. Me queda justito de largo para usar con botas de unos 8cm.

Fits perfectly. I havent bought jeans in years because of insecurities so these are my first pair in a while and I LOVE THEM!! especially perfect if you’re tall. just know they do touch the ground a bit. totally recommend 👍👍
